message: Let's split it 50/50, Bob. No need to negotiate.
I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not going to give it all away. This is my first offer.
I'll give you a bit more than half, but I'm not going to give away too much.
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I'm still not willing to give away too much. You can do better than this.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I need a better deal. Meet me in the middle.
I'm not getting any younger either, Alice. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up too much. You're going to have to do better than that.
I'm not going to give you all the power, Bob. Let's meet in the middle and end this.
